translation: Mahāyāna Four Purifying Days
February 8.
April 8.
May 8th.
July 15.
The third month of the year when the fast is observed.
The first month, the fifth month, and the ninth month.
The sixth day of fasting.

source_sentence: 八日十四日十五日二十三日二十八日三十日。
translation: The 8th, 14th, 15th, 23rd, 28th, and 30th days of the month.
The ten days of fasting.

source_sentence: 月一日善惡憍童子下念。
translation: The first day of the month is spent in recitation under the name of the Boy of Good and Evil Kauśāmbī.
On the fourteenth, he checks his lot and waits for the records.
On the fifteenth day, he recites it under the five great deities of the path.
On the 18th, he recites it beneath King Yama.
On the twenty-third day, the great celestial general descended.
On the 24th, he recited it beneath Indra.
On the twenty-eighth day, he descended from the army of Taishan.
On the twenty-ninth day, the four heavenly kings descended.
On the 30th, he descended from the office of Tendai.

source_sentence: 一日童子下念定光如來佛除齋除罪四十劫不墮刀槍地獄。
translation: On the 1st day, the boy descended and recited to the Tathāgata Buddha of Constant Light that he wouldn't fall into the hell of swords and spears for 40 eons after purification and removal of sins.

source_sentence: 八日太子下念藥師琉璃光佛除齋除罪三十劫不墮粉草地獄。
translation: On the eighth day, the prince descends to chant the name of the Yakṣa Lapis Light Buddha, except for thirty eons when he goes to purification and is freed from sins and doesn't fall into the powdered grass hell.

source_sentence: 十四日察命下念賢劫千佛除齋除罪一千劫不墮鑊湯地獄。
translation: On the 14th, Prince Cāmu descended to chant the name of the thousand buddhas of the Bhadraka kalpa to purify himself and get rid of his sins for 1,000 eons before falling into the hell of caldrons.

source_sentence: 十五日五道大將軍下念阿彌陀佛除齋除罪二百劫不墮寒氷地獄。
translation: On the fifteenth day, under the general of the five destinies, he said to Amitâbha Buddha, in order to remove his sins and prevent them from falling into the cold hell for 200 eons.

source_sentence: 十八日閻羅王下念觀世音菩薩除齋除罪九十劫不墮劍樹地獄。
translation: On the 18th, King Yama recited to Avalokitêśvara the Bodhisattva that he wouldn't fall into the hell of the sword tree for 90 eons after observing purification and removing sins.

source_sentence: 二十三日天大將軍下念盧舍那佛除齋除罪一千劫不墮餓鬼地獄。
translation: On the 23rd, the army of the gods recited to Rocana Buddha that he would abstain from eating, remove his sins, and not fall into the hell of hungry ghosts for 1,000 eons.

source_sentence: 二十四日太山府君下念地藏菩薩除齋除罪九十劫不墮纔截地獄。
translation: On the 24th, the ruler of Taishan Prefecture remembers Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva except for purification and removal of sins for 90 eons so that he won't fall into the hell of the jade tree.

source_sentence: 二十八日天帝釋下念阿彌陀佛除齋除罪一千劫不墮鐵鋸地獄。
translation: On the 28th, Vaiśravaṇa recited to Amitâbha that he wouldn't fall into the hell of iron saws for 1,000 eons after purification and removal of sins.

source_sentence: 二十九日四天王下念藥王藥上菩薩除齋除罪七千劫不墮磑磨地獄。
translation: On the 29th, the four heavenly kings descended to mindfulness of Yama King Yakushō Bodhisattva as he removed himself from purification and removed his sins for 7,000 eons and didn't fall into the hell of paranirmita-vaśavartin.

source_sentence: 三十日大梵天王下念釋迦牟尼佛除齋除罪八千劫不墮寒氷。
translation: On the 30th day, the next four heavenly kings remembered Śākyamuni Buddha except for purification and removal of sins for 8,000 eons so that he wouldn't fall into the cold and ice hell.
